product_name: Isis Vera Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stretchy and comfy, the women's Isis Vera Capri Pants love intense yoga workouts and super-laidback lounging on weekends. Nylon/spandex capris feature great stretch and shape retention. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Soft, ribbed waistband has an adjustable drawcord. Isis Vera Capri Pants have a relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: Stretchy and comfy, the women's Isis Vera Capri Pants love intense yoga workouts and super-laidback lounging on weekends.
